name: A Little Bit S'more
description:
"My Dad was never good at words, but he was really good at camping" ⛺

A Little Bit S'more is a cosy, arcade-style, narrative game . Walk through 1993-2023 in 10-year increments as you learn how to bring joy to the world with the sweetest treat imaginable. Inspired by the classic 1991 Yoshi NES game!

It's a bit like Unpacking... but you're making s'mores!

Created by Lucky Seven Games! 🎲

Lead Narrative/Producer - Brynmor (eatchillis) 
Lead Audio/QA - Matthew (gamewave-audio)
Lead Artist/Designer - Pana (fruityrats)
Narrative/Designer - CJ (Crackerjackalope)
Lead Code/Artist - Joaquin (StinkyGameDev)
Lead Designer/Coder - Sam (samcox08)

The game was created as a part of BuddyUpJam Winter 2023. 

Special Thanks to:
Bev - Extra Art help!
